actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to carry out audits of expenditures and financial transactions of Members, officers, and standing committees of the House of Representatives.
short_title: Legislative Accounts Audit and Control Act

summary.text: Legislative Accounts Audit and Control Act - Directs the Comptroller General to conduct annual audits of any financial transaction of each Member, officer, and standing committee of the House of Representatives involving the contingent fund of the House, retroactive to 1977. Requires that each annual report be submitted to the Speaker of the House of Representatives and be available for public inspection.

titles.title: Legislative Accounts Audit and Control Act

A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to carry out audits of expenditures and financial transactions of Members, officers, and standing committees of the House of Representatives.
